currentIssues.description: Chord labels (Fmaj7, Em7, etc.) have extremely poor contrast ratio (~1.5:1) against dark background
Lyrics text lacks sufficient size and weight for teleprompter use at 3-10ft viewing distance
Font size too small for teleprompter context - appears to be ~24-32px when 48-72px minimum needed
Lyrics have insufficient contrast (~2.8:1) for stage visibility
Inadequate vertical spacing between lyric lines for quick reading during performance

recommendations.title: Increase chord label contrast
recommendations.description: Change orange chord labels to bright yellow or white for WCAG AA compliance and stage visibility
recommendations.code: className='text-yellow-400' // or text-white for maximum contrast

recommendations.title: Brighten lyrics text
recommendations.description: Change lyrics from gray-500 to gray-100 or white for stage visibility

recommendations.title: Increase line height for readability
recommendations.description: Add generous line spacing for quick scanning during performance

recommendations.title: Increase font size for teleprompter use
recommendations.description: Scale up lyrics to 60-72px and chords to 48px for comfortable reading at performance distance
recommendations.code:
className='text-6xl lg:text-7xl font-medium' // for lyrics
className='text-4xl lg:text-5xl font-bold' // for chords

recommendations.title: Add high contrast mode toggle
recommendations.description: Implement a toggle for maximum contrast white-on-black mode for varying stage lighting
